title: hosemary
author: hosemary
created_time: August 04, 2023, 09:38:54 PMLast edit: August 04, 2023, 09:53:30 PM by hosseinimr93
content: I am creating this topic to use it as a reference for a negative feedback.Scammers Profile Link:  coinwalletonlineReference Link:  here is a good place for balance searching (Archived.)I just visited a topic promoting a tool that can be used for getting the total balance of multiple bitcoin addresses. If you visit the homepage of the website in question, you will see that it's the cloned website of coinb.in. I recommend everyone to avoid coinbin(dot)homes and any other service that is advertised by coinwalletonline.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I visited the website coinbin.homes/searchbalance/ but it doesn't look like a Coinb.in but clicking the home it brings you back to the same page. However, after clicking the coinbin.homes indeed it's a clone version of Coinb.in.It's weird on the first access on the site because they pointed you to a different page without exploring the site you will never know that there is a trap.
